name: Handicat
description:
Try to manage all the tasks!

During coding time multiple unforeseen cleanup may occur. Try to solve all the tasks and don’t panic. If your stress level gets too high, you lose. But be always aware of cheeky cats!

3 Types of tasks exist:

  • Hold key
  • Press key multiple times
  • Drag and drop

Team:

  • Julian (Christoph) "Schwaig" Ertsey
  • Julian (Julian) Geheeb
  • Julian (Dominik) Huber
  • Julian (Sabine) Röggla
  • Julian (Julian) Zimmermann

Support

  • Vedad Barucija (Soundtrack)
